meanings.definition: Engaging in an activity or process regularly or repeatedly to improve or maintain skills.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys practising her piano every day to get better.
meanings.sent2: He is practising his soccer skills after school.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was practising her dance moves in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Practising drawing every day is like sharpening a pencil for creativity.
meanings.sent5: Practising spelling words aloud helps with memorization.

meanings.definition: Rehearsing a performance or skill in order to improve proficiency.
meanings.sent1: The actors are practising their lines for the play.
meanings.sent2: She is practising her speech for the competition.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed to be practising its bark for the talent show.
meanings.sent4: Practising a magic trick over and over makes it flawless.
meanings.sent5: Practising a dance routine helps with coordination.

meanings.definition: Carrying out a profession or occupation, especially in a practical way.
meanings.sent1: He is practising law at the firm downtown.
meanings.sent2: She is practising medicine at the local clinic.
meanings.sent3: The chef was practising his culinary skills in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Practising carpentry requires precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: Practising photography captures moments in time.
